Jogo bem legal, bom pra jogar com os amigos ou sozinho mesmo. Gostei mais de jogar de sobrevivente. Tem uns killer que sÃ£o apelÃµes Ã© quase impossÃ­vel escapar deles. Tem vez que o jogo erra ao encontrar partida com jogadores de habilidades parecidas, e tem vez que demora pra encontrar partida. Mas mesmo assim recomendo!

It's a fun game to play by yourself or with friends. Either Killer or Survivor, the game is fairly easy to pick up and understand. You get progress by playing the game and leveling up whichever character you prefer, and for someone like me who enjoys making improvements, the game has a great system for it. The only downside, a very obvious one, is the 'pay to win' side of things. Both Killers and Survivors have perks, some better and more annoying than others. Other than that, great game.
